tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  machine_id INT,
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_value FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MachineData (
    machine_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id UUID,
    sensor_type TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    reading FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE machine_health (
    machine_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    vibration_level FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE predictive_maintenance (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    machine_id INT,
    prediction TEXT,
    confidence_level FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);
